subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Vlado Ilievski hit a 3-pointer with 11 seconds remaining and Macedonia stunned host Lithuania, 67-65, to reach the semifinals of the European championships for the first time.
snippet: Vlado Ilievski hit a 3-pointer with 11 seconds remaining and Macedonia stunned host Lithuania, 67-65, to reach the semifinals of the European championships for the first time.
